attributes.action: Abolish Council Tax Totally and only charge for the Services used.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Only pay for the services you use.
(why pay for services you don`t use).
When was the last time you or a member of your family used
a Library,
a School,
a Sport`s Centre,
a Nursing/Care Home.
The list is endless.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
